text: If something can be seen with the naked eye, it means that it can be seen without using a microscope, binoculars, glasses or a telescope. In astronomy, a naked-eye object is something, such as a star, that the general public can see without using these tools. == Other websites == * Naked Eye Observing in Astronomy * Naked-Eye Stargazing: Learning the Sky and its constellations * Naked Eye Navigation , Polynesia Voyages Category:Astronomy
title: Naked eye
